snippet: Five opposition parties in Bahrain have jointly denounced the Sunni-ruled island as a police state and demanded a transition to a constitutional monarchy.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: Five opposition parties in Bahrain have jointly denounced the Sunni-ruled island as a police state and demanded a transition to a constitutional monarchy.

headline.main: Bahrain: Opposition Demands Switch to Constitutional Monarchy
headline.print_headline: Bahrain: Opposition Demands Switch To Constitutional Monarchy
